reviewText: I thought the story was ok. But the story dragged on. This is a show that should have been 12 episodes. Because after that it got boring. Ps. I know that this show wasn't released here but to charge $900 is not cool.

The characters are drawn very beautifully and the story line is captivating. I enjoyed watching this anime and planning on watching it again. I love the main character luka because he is cool, cute and very strong.
The DVD collection is a must have if you enjoy the manga. Clearly it doesn't go into the same depth, but it is still and enjoyable watch and well worth the price.
